description: Recent images captured by the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) are the clearest ever pictures of the jet arriving from the massive black hole in the galaxy named Messier 87 (M87). There are clear details in the image shot by the telescope, which show the change of brightness, shape and the jet that is usually in disguise. As per scientists, this discovery will help them learn how black holes send out such powerful jets, while also explaining the way they affect the galaxies near them.
title: JWST Reveals Stunning New Details About M87’s Supermassive Black Hole Jet

description: The European Space Agency (ESA) is keeping a close eye on the Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS on its journey through the solar system. A spacecraft, specially designed for the Jupiter and Mars missions, will monitor the interstellar comet. Notably, this is the third known interstellar object that has marked its way through the solar system and is continuing to do so. Likewise, astronomers have suggested that the 3I/ATLAS will potentially be seen by the ground-based telescopes. It will then pass the sun during its closest ever approach.
title: Mars and Jupiter Probes Set to Monitor Interstellar Comet 3I/ATLAS During Its Sun Approach This Month

description: With the iPhone 17 launch in the rear window, all eyes are now on Apple’s October event. It is expected to take place this month, showcasing the latest devices in the Cupertino-based tech giant’s iPad Pro and smart home device lineup. Leaks have hinted towards the launch of the M5-powered iPad Pro, AirTag 2, and updated Vision Pro, and other devices. Although Apple remains pretty tight-lipped on the exact date of its event, we can deduce will announce the October event based on the trend of yesteryears.
title: M5 iPad Pro, AirTag 2 Launch Countdown: This Is When Apple Can Announce October Event

description: WhatsApp may soon allow you to reserve usernames, as per a feature tracker. The feature is currently said to be in development for its Android app and is not yet available to beta testers. Since features are gradually rolled out, reserving usernames will help users pick out their preferred usernames and reduce the risk of them being taken by others. This feature is said to be a step towards the introduction of usernames on WhatsApp.
title: WhatsApp for Android Said to Be Testing a Feature That Lets Users Reserve Their Usernames

description: Lava Bold N1 Lite has been listed on Amazon ahead of its launch in India. The unannounced smartphone sports a 6.75-inch HD+ display with a 90Hz refresh rate. It is listed with an unspecified UniSoc octa-core processor, coupled with 3GB of RAM and 64GB of onboard storage. The Lava Bold N1 Lite has 13-megapixel AI rear camera and it runs on Android 15. The handset could debut with a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Lava Bold N1 Lite With 5,000mAh Battery Listed on Amazon Ahead of Launch: Price in India, Specifications

description: Samsung Galaxy A07, Galaxy F07, and Galaxy M07 4G have been launched in India. The new Samsung handsets have an identical set of features and specifications, with the only differentiators between them being the colourways and price. The Galaxy A07, Galaxy F07, and Galaxy M07 will be sold via different retail channels in the country. The handsets are equipped with a 6.7-inch HD LCD screen, MediaTek Helio G99 chipset, 50-megapixel rear camera, and a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy A07, Galaxy F07, and Galaxy M07 4G Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, which began on September 23 for everyone, offered 24-hour early access to Prime subscribers. The sale event is in its second week, and there are still many good deals that you can grab before the sale ends. During the Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale 2025, you can buy various electronics like phones, smart TVs, true wireless stereo (TWS) headsets, home appliances, washing machines, refrigerators, PCs, and laptops at discounted prices. Additionally, parent can also get their children a new smartwatch with GPS tracking to ensure their safety and talk to them without a phone.
title: Amazon Sale 2025: Best Deals on Kids Smartwatches with GPS From Noise, Boat, Fastrack, and More Brands

description: The iQOO Neo 10 is a mid-range smartphone that is built for the gaming crowd, but may end up being in the hands of the casual user because of the advantages its gamer-grade hardware brings to the table. While most mid-range smartphones focus on design and camera-centric features, iQOO’s Neo 10 stands out from the crowd for different reasons.
title: iQOO Neo 10 Review: Gaming-Grade Hardware for Everyone

description: Google could finally make the switch from Samsung Foundry to MediaTek for the modem in the Pixel 11 series. As per claims, the purported flagship will use a MediaTek M90 modem, which was introduced at MWC 2025. It is said to offer faster networking speeds, lower energy consumption, AI enhancements. The modem is expected to be integrated into the Tensor G6 SoC that will power the Pixel 11 series.
title: Google Said to Be Testing ‘More Efficient’ MediaTek Modem for Pixel 11 Series

description: Samsung is gearing up to introduce a new variant of its Galaxy Z Fold 7 in China this month, the company recently announced. The upcoming book-style phone is expected to be a special edition model of the flagship foldable handset, which was introduced in India and global markets in July 2025. While details remain under wraps, the upcoming Galaxy Z Fold 7 Special Edition is reportedly codenamed W26 and may have iterative changes.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Special Edition China Launch Date Announced: Expected Features

description: The Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Edition is expected to go official soon. As per the company, it will have a stylised design and nano-engraved motifs inspired by HBO's Game of Thrones. From expected price in India to its features, and specifications, here's everything we know about the Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Edition so far.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Game of Thrones Edition: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More
